mpicxx  -O3  -g -fopenmp -march=native -lgcc_s -lc -D PRINT_DEBUG_MSG -g  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/test_cuda.dir/test_cuda.cu.o CMakeFiles/test_cuda.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -o test_cuda  -L/home/a100/cu111/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/home/a100/cu111/targets/x86_64-linux/lib -Wl,-rpath,/home/a100/workspace/Mithril_MultiGPU/build:/home/a100/mpi/lib:/home/a100/boost-install/lib:/home/a100/cu111/lib64 ../libcore.so ../libcontext.a ../libparallel.a ../libcudahelp.a /home/a100/mpi/lib/libmpi.so /home/a100/boost-install/lib/libboost_program_options.so /home/a100/cu111/lib64/libcudart.so /home/a100/cu111/lib64/libcublas.so /home/a100/cu111/lib64/libcudnn.so /home/a100/cu111/lib64/libcusparse.so /home/a100/nccl-install/lib/libnccl_static.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
